Producer: Daniel Grodnik, Bobby Ranghelov, Luillo Ruiz, Bret Saxon
Production Co: Pimienta, Daniel Grodnik Productions, Imprint Entertainment, Wonderfilm Media, Source Investments B.V.
Synopsis: Hunter and collector Frank Walsh expects a big payday after bagging a priceless white jaguar for a zoo. But the ship bearing Frank's precious cargo has another predator -- a political assassin facing extradition to America. When the prisoner manages to break free, Walsh must utilize his expert skills to capture the dangerous killer -- not dead, but alive.
Title: Primal
